metadata.Title: CVE-2022-23959 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
In Varnish Cache before 6.6.2 and 7.x before 7.0.2, Varnish Cache 6.0 LTS before 6.0.10, and and Varnish Enterprise (Cache Plus) 4.1.x before 4.1.11r6 and 6.0.x before 6.0.9r4, request smuggling can occur for HTTP/1 connections.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2022-23959` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libvarnishapi2 - 6.5.2-1ubuntu0.2
varnish - 6.5.2-1ubuntu0.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: varnish package in impish was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.5.2-1ubuntu0.2').
